description: A small wet wipe saturated with a 70% solution of isopropyl alcohol.  Used for personal hygiene or disinfecting small wounds.
//weight: we presume that the weight in source is that of the whole package (wipe and sachet), rather than just the wipe
based on research, the wipe might be the heavier part of it, because it would absorb a significant amount of alcohol solution
since there seems to be no better source, we presume that the wipe itself weighs ~1 g, with the rest going to the (fairly-lightweight) foil sachet

notes: height estimated based on visual reference
trim is to account for the size of the package
we presume that listed are the dimensions of the package, rather than the swab
